pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"EPEL(Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux) 是由 Fedora Special Interest Group 维护的 Enterprise Linux（RHEL、CentOS）中经常用到的包。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"下面以 Rocky Linux 9 为例讲解如何使用本镜像站的 epel 镜像。RHEL 及其他衍生发行版同样可用该方法。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先从 Extras 里安装 epel-release："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}dnf install epel-release","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["用如下命令自动替换：（修改自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/tuna/issues/issues/687","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://github.com/tuna/issues/issues/687"}],"）"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}sed -e 's!^metalink=!#metalink=!g' \
    -e 's!^#baseurl=!baseurl=!g' \
    -e 's!https\?://download\.fedoraproject\.org/pub/epel!{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}!g' \
    -e 's!https\?://download\.example/pub/epel!{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}!g' \
    -i /etc/yum.repos.d/epel{,-testing}.repo","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"epel.repo"}]," 的修改结果如下：（仅供参考，不同版本可能不同）"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[epel]
name=Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux $releasever - $basearch
# It is much more secure to use the metalink, but if you wish to use a local mirror
# place its address here.
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$releasever/Everything/$basearch/
#metalink=https://mirrors.fedoraproject.org/metalink?repo=epel-$releasever&arch=$basearch&infra=$infra&content=$contentdir
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
countme=1
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-EPEL-$releasever

[epel-debuginfo]
name=Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux $releasever - $basearch - Debug
# It is much more secure to use the metalink, but if you wish to use a local mirror
# place its address here.
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$releasever/Everything/$basearch/debug/
#metalink=https://mirrors.fedoraproject.org/metalink?repo=epel-debug-$releasever&arch=$basearch&infra=$infra&content=$contentdir
enabled=0
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-EPEL-$releasever
gpgcheck=1

[epel-source]
name=Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux $releasever - $basearch - Source
# It is much more secure to use the metalink, but if you wish to use a local mirror
# place its address here.
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/$releasever/Everything/source/tree/
#metalink=https://mirrors.fedoraproject.org/metalink?repo=epel-source-$releasever&arch=$basearch&infra=$infra&content=$contentdir
enabled=0
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-EPEL-$releasever
gpgcheck=1","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["由于无法同步，镜像站不包含 EPEL Cisco OpenH264 仓库（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"epel-cisco-openh264.repo"}],"），如果不需要可手动将其改为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"enabled=0"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"dnf update"}]," 测试一下吧。"]}]]}]

meta.title: EPEL 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
